docs.snippet: Some of Mr. Trump’s top Hispanic Republican supporters denounced his reversal after signaling a more conciliatory approach to illegal immigrants less than two weeks ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of Mr. Trump’s top Hispanic Republican supporters denounced his reversal after signaling a more conciliatory approach to illegal immigrants less than two weeks ago.
docs.abstract: Speech delivered by Donald Trump in Phoenix draws backlash from candidate's conservative Hispanic supporters, who call address anti-immigrant; critics say speech has dashed hopes that Trump was softening his stance on immigration.

headline.main: ‘He Used Us as Props’: Conservative Hispanics Deplore Donald Trump’s Speech
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Fiery Immigration Speech Draws Backlash

docs.snippet: A groundskeeper who came to the U.S. two decades ago stood outside the Phoenix hall where the candidate spoke and shared some thoughts of his own....
docs.lead_paragraph: A groundskeeper who came to the U.S. two decades ago stood outside the Phoenix hall where the candidate spoke and shared some thoughts of his own.
docs.abstract: Jose Enrique Camacho, undocumented Mexican immigrant and groundskeeper at Phoenix apartment building, expresses desire to tell Donald Trump of his struggles and pride at being part of fabric of America; disputes Trump's portrayal of Mexicans immigrants as criminals.

headline.main: What an Undocumented Immigrant Wanted to Tell Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Worker Wishes Candidate Knew of His Pride and Toil

docs.snippet: Acting Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy failed in a second attempt on Friday to win parliament's backing to form a government, increasing the likelihood that Spain will have to hold another election - its third in a year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Acting Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy failed in a second attempt on Friday to win parliament's backing to form a government, increasing the likelihood that Spain will have to hold another election - its third in a year.
